GSD.description:
xen: delay xen_hvm_init_time_ops() if kdump is boot on vcpu>=32

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.34 by commit 5c0750cad73350e1c504eb91a94093a79f6f6296. For more details please see the references link.
